result.ga: an raibh gruaig air
result.orig: an raibh gruaig air
result.html: an raibh gruaig airDid it have hair?

result.eng: It was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.
result.ga: b'iad na normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradh
result.orig: b'iad na normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradh
result.html: b'iad na normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradhIt was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.
result.ponchtml: b'iad na normannaiġ a ṫosaiġ an nós féasóg a ḃearraḋ agus gruaig a ġearraḋIt was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.

result.ga: bhí folt ar dhath an óir uirthi

result.ponchtml: ḃí folt ar ḋaṫ an óir uirṫiShe had gold-coloured hair.

result.ga: cén dath atá ar do chuid gruaige

result.eng: She begins to comb her hair.

result.eng: She would bet that his hair has gotten greyer.

result.eng: Her hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.
result.ga: bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteach
result.orig: bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteach

result.ponchtml: ḃí a cuid gruaige greamaiṫe dá baiṫis ag an mbáisteaċHer hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.

result.eng: She was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ga: buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.orig: buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh

result.ponchtml: buaileaḋ í roinnt uaireanta agus ċuaṫas i muinín an ḟornirt ċun a cuid gruaige a ḃearraḋShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.

result.eng: He grabbed her by her hair.
result.html: fuair sé greim gruaige uirthiHe grabbed her by her hair.
result.ponchtml: fuair sé greim gruaige uirṫiHe grabbed her by her hair.
